meaningMnemonic: You know that 麺 means "noodles", and つゆ is another word for "soup" or "broth". Put the two together and you have the delicious <vocabulary>mentsuyu </vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>noodle soup base</vocabulary>. It's usually made of dashi, soy sauce, mirin and sugar​. Yum!
readingMnemonic: You learned the reading for 麺 when you learned the kanji.
